import React from 'react' import Card from '../card/card.component' import './filter-section.component.scss' export default function Filter({ filterHeading, options, activeFilterValue, lauchYearChangeCallback }) { console.log(activeFilterValue) const handleFilterClick = (filter) => { lauchYearChangeCallback(filter) } return (

SpaceX Launch Program

{filterHeading}

    {options.map(filter =>
  • handleFilterClick(filter)}>

) }
